entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
